name: correlation_arb_tech_pairs
description: Statistical arbitrage on correlated tech stock pairs using z-score divergence
notes: Targets highly correlated tech pairs. Requires 90-day correlation >= 0.7 and z-score >= 2.0 for entry. Uses hedge ratio from linear regression (capped at 2.0). Validates correlation stability over 30 days. Confirms with RSI and Bollinger Band divergence. Historical reversion rate > 70% required.
